DOC.brief_title: European Active Surveillance Study Intrauterine Devices
DOC.detailed_description: This large , multinational , prospective , control , long-term cohort study follow series cohort . The cohort consist new user different group intrauterine device ( IUDs ) . Primarily , non-interference approach - exception standardize diagnostic workup identify uterine perforation - use provide standardized , comprehensive reliable information IUDs routine medical condition . The primary objective study assess risk intrauterine device ( IUD ) use study population representative actual user individual IUDs . The primary clinical outcome interest uterine perforation rate . Secondary objective among others : - time interval IUD insertion uterine perforation - impact post-partal IUD insertion uterine perforation rate - proportion uterine perforation associate IUD insertion serious clinical complication - incidence medically relevant adverse event associate IUP use The combined cohort include 60000 woman recruit six European country . Enrollment begin November 2006 end 2012 . Patients undergo follow-up least 1 year . Recruitment cohort member conduct via network approximately 2000 gynecologist . Enrollment procedure interfere prescribe behavior physician individual need participate woman . Influence preference specific oral contraceptive avoid significant effort undertaken ensure standardize , comprehensive reliable documentation baseline characteristic adverse event follow-up period . The study participant woman age 18 old new insertion IUD willing participate cohort study . There specific medical inclusion exclusion criterion . However , woman cooperative may exclude study participation . Also woman language barrier eligible study inclusion . This study maintain scientific independence govern independent Advisory Council . The Center Epidemiology Health Research Berlin , Germany research team accountable Advisory Council ( AC ) scientific matter . The member AC wil international expert relevant scientific field ( e. g. epidemiology , gynecology cardiology ) . The study start relevant legal ethical requirement fulfil . Information identity patient treat physician keep separated clinical information throughout study . All relevant national data protection law follow .
